title: Rabbit Salad with Mashed Potatoes
summary: Tender rabbit pieces served with buttery mashed potatoes infused with cream cheese and cheddar.
instructions: Boil the potatoes until soft, then mash with butter, cream cheese, and cheddar.
Season the rabbit meat with salt and pepper.
Arrange mashed potatoes on a plate, top with greens and rabbit pieces.
Garnish with a drizzle of olive oil and serve warm.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook pasta in salted water.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Whisk eggs and cheese together.
Toss pasta with pancetta and egg mixture off the heat.
Serve immediately with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken chunks cooked in a creamy, spiced tomato-based sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste.
Grill until golden and set aside.
Fry onion, add tomato puree, and simmer.
Add cream and grilled chicken, simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender strips of beef and mushrooms in a creamy sauce served over noodles.
instructions: Cook beef until browned, set aside.
Fry onions and mushrooms until soft.
Add sour cream and mustard, stir well.
Return beef and simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve over egg noodles or rice.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A colorful mix of vegetables sautéed with soy sauce and garlic.
instructions: Heat oil in a wok and add garlic.
Add all vegetables and stir-fry for 5–7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and toss to coat.
Serve hot with steamed rice.

title: Avocado Toast Deluxe
summary: Toasted bread topped with smashed avocado, eggs, and chili flakes.
instructions: Toast the bread slices.
Mash avocado with salt and spread on toast.
Top with poached or fried eggs.
Sprinkle chili flakes and serve immediately.

title: Classic Pancakes
summary: Fluffy homemade pancakes served with butter and maple syrup.
instructions: Mix dry ingredients together.
Add egg and milk, whisk until smooth.
Cook small scoops on a greased pan until golden.
Serve with butter and maple syrup.
